Wide Application: The diagnostic scanner is widely compatible with most of the vehicles available on the market that have OBD II ports, such as sedans, pickup trucks, SUVs, crossovers, etc. However, it should be noted that this device is not suitable for hybrid or electric vehicles

name: TOPDON Carpal OBD2 Scanner Bluetooth - Scanner for Car, AI-Assisted All System Diagnostic Tool for iOS & Android, Vehicle Health Check, 6 Maintenance Services, Smog Check, Repair Guide
short_description: [Easy OBD2 Bluetooth Scanner, Complete Car Insights] Enjoy peace of mind with our comprehensive vehicle health check. From engine to steering, CarPal covers every crucial vehicle system and meticulously evaluates your car's health and enables read/clear codes with one tap. Understanding engine status has never been easier. CarPal indicates the severity of faults (severe or minor), and each code comes with tailored repair instructions to help you prioritize repairs and make informed decisions.

[6 Essential Maintenance Functions] Take your vehicle maintenance to the next level with CarPal. This advanced diagnostic tool offers 6 of the most common reset services to keep your car running at its best. Start with features like Oil Reset and TPMS Reset to manage your vehicle's routine needs, and BMS Reset and EPB Reset for smoother driving. Throttle Adaptation and DPF Regeneration maintain optimal engine efficiency.

[Advanced Care, Save Time and Money] The Battery Test feature monitors real-time voltage and tracks battery performance to stay ahead of potential issues and maximize battery longevity. Our Smog Check allows you to perform a pre-test of the vehicle emissions, ensuring you pass your annual inspections. And for those who crave speed, the Performance Test measures your car's 0-60mph acceleration, giving you a clear picture of the vehicle’s capabilities.

[Your Car's Health, Perfectly Monitored] CarPal is designed to make vehicle maintenance straightforward and efficient. With smart AutoVIN for rapid identification, you can easily connect to your car without manual inputs. The live data will be visualized in various formats, including graphs, numerical values and gauge displays, and clear 4-in-1 data graphs, making it effortless to monitor real-time performance. The data record/report enables playback and further analysis.

[Mobile Mechanic for On-the-Go Car Care] Featuring Bluetooth 5.0 technology, CarPal provides a stable wireless connection with no-cable convenience in a range of up to 33ft/10m, ideal for you to diagnose from a comfortable distance. This diagnostic tool is compatible with Android 7.0 or above and iOS 11.0 or above, transforming a phone into an easy-to-use scanner. Along with a compact body that fits in a pocket or toolbox, CarPal will be your vehicle health partner on the move.

[One-Stop Solutions for Simplified Repairs] TOPDON’s CarPal delivers everything you need for efficient and accurate repairs. Instantly access detailed DTC repair guides, stay updated with the latest Technical Service Bulletins (TSBs), and easily locate your vehicle's diagnostic port. Additionally, the comprehensive Warning Light Library provides clear explanations, potential causes, and recommended actions for all dashboard lights.

[What You Will Get] Package includes: CarPal*1, Quick Start Guide*1. CarPal's multilingual support—covering English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Traditional Chinese, and Chinese—ensures you receive top-notch support in your preferred language. Plus, we offer premium after-sales service to ensure your complete satisfaction. The customer support team is always here to provide timely and professional assistance.Tips: Cannot support 32-bit cell phones.

name: Veepeak Mini Bluetooth OBD2 Scanner for Android – Not Compatible with iOS – Wireless Check Engine Light Code Reader & Diagnostic Tool
short_description: ⚠️ IMPORTANT – iOS NOT SUPPORTED: This Bluetooth OBD2 scanner is NOT compatible with iPhone or iPad. It is compatible with Android phones and tablets ONLY. For iOS devices, please choose the Bluetooth LE version – OBDCheck BLE. Android car head units and Wi-Fi connection are also not supported.

READ BEFORE PURCHASE: This device requires a compatible third-party app to operate, and works with most 1996+ OBD-II compliant vehicles for generic OBD-II functions. EV support varies by model year —check the Car Scanner app profile. Please read the product description and FAQ for supported functions.

GENERIC OBD-II FUNCTIONS – read & clear trouble codes for check engine light (CEL or MIL), view freeze frame data, I/M readiness, and live sensor data to help monitor vehicle health and diagnose check engine problems.

LIVE SENSOR DATA – Get vehicle speed, RPM, engine coolant temp, throttle position, O2 readings, fuel trim, mass air flow, and more on your Android device. You can monitor fuel economy and create your own dashboard. (Manufacturer-specific data like transmission temperature may not be supported)

APP COMPATIBILITY – Compatible with popular Android apps like Car Scanner ELM OBD2, Torque, OBD Fusion, Dr. Prius, CVTz50; NOT compatible with BimmerCode, BimmerLink, ABRP, and other Apps that require specialized hardware.

NOTES: Advanced diagnostics (ABS, SRS, TPMS, transmission, etc.) and manufacturer-specific functions including oil light reset, injector coding, EPB reset, relearning, adaptation and service performing are NOT supported.

TIPS FOR PROPER USE: Get the right app to ensure proper functionality. Insert the device firmly into the OBD port to avoid connection issues. Please review the latest Instructions for Use (IFU) on the product page for current compatibility, usage, FAQs and troubleshooting guide.
